verses.verse: וִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> vi-ri-Cho Now Jericho סֹגֶ֣רֶת <WH5462> so-Ge-ret was straitly וּמְסֻגֶּ֔רֶת <WH5462> u-me-sug-Ge-ret, shut up מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei because בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein no יוֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> yo-Tze none went out וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein one בָּֽא׃ <WH935> Ba. and none came in ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a', unto Joshua רְאֵה֙ <WH7200> re-'Eh See נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti I have given בְיָֽדְךָ֔ <WH3027> ve-ya-de-Cha, into thine hand אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> ye-ri-Cho Jericho וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַלְכָּ֑הּ <WH4428> mal-Kah; and the king גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <WH1368> gib-bo-Rei thereof [and] the mighty men הֶחָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> he-Cha-yil. of valour

וְסַבֹּתֶ֣ם <WH5437> ve-sab-bo-Tem And ye shall compass אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, the city כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kol all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah, of war הַקֵּ֥יף <WH5362> hak-Keif [and] go round about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city פַּ֣עַם <WH6471> Pa-'am anvil אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> 'e-Chat; a כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh so תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh Thus shalt thou do שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> She-shet six יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. days

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah And seven כֹהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> cho-ha-Nim priests יִשְׂאוּ֩ <WH5375> yis-'U shall bear שִׁבְעָ֨ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <WH7782> shof-Rot trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <WH3104> hai-yov-Lim of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָאָר֔וֹן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron, the ark וּבַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> u-vai-yOm day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, and the seventh תָּסֹ֥בּוּ <WH5437> ta-Sob-bu ye shall compass אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim; times וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> ve-hak-Ko-ha-Nim, and the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> yit-ke-'U shall blow בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <WH7782> bash-sho-fa-Rot. with the trumpets

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become בִּמְשֹׁ֣ךְ׀ <WH4900> bim-Shoch And it shall come to pass that when they make a long בְּקֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> be-Ke-ren horn הַיּוֹבֵ֗ל <WH3104> hai-yo-Vel, [blast] with the ram's; בְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם be-sha-me-'a-chem ככְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם֙ <WH8085> ke-sha-me-'a-Chem listen קאֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> hash-sho-Far, of the trumpet יָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> ya-Ri-'u shall shout כָל־ <WH3605> chol all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am all the people תְּרוּעָ֣ה <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah; with a great וְנָ֨פְלָ֜ה <WH5307> ve-Na-fe-Lah shall fall down חוֹמַ֤ת <WH2346> cho-Mat and the wall הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the city תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <WH8478> tach-Tei-ha, flat וְעָל֥וּ <WH5927> ve-'a-Lu shall ascend up הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and the people אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man נֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5048> neg-Do. straight

וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נוּן֙ <WH5126> nun of Nun אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, to שְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> se-'U unto them Take up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הַבְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit; of the covenant וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah and let seven כֹֽהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> cho-ha-Nim, priests יִשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> yis-'U bear שִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah seven שֽׁוֹפְרוֹת֙ <WH7782> shof-rOt trumpets יוֹבְלִ֔ים <WH3104> yov-Lim, of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיֹּאמְרוּ vai-yo-me-ru כוַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer answer קאֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, unto the people עִבְר֖וּ <WH5674> 'iv-Ru Pass on וְסֹ֣בּוּ <WH5437> ve-Sob-bu and compass אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; the city וְהֶ֣חָל֔וּץ <WH2502> ve-He-cha-Lutz, and let him that is armed יַעֲבֹ֕ר <WH5674> ya-'a-Vor pass on לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כֶּאֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> ke-'e-Mor had spoken יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <WH3091> ye-ho-shu-a' And it came to pass when Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָם֒ <WH5971> ha-'Am unto the people וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah that the seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <WH5375> no-se-'Im bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah the seven שׁוֹפְר֤וֹת <WH7782> shof-Rot trumpets הַיּֽוֹבְלִים֙ <WH3104> hai-yov-Lim of rams' horns לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD עָבְר֕וּ <WH5674> 'a-ve-Ru passed on וְתָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> ve-ta-ke-'U and blew בַּשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> bash-sho-fa-Rot; with the trumpets וַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> va-'a-rOn and the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> be-Rit of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD הֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech followed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. them

וְהֶחָל֣וּץ <WH2502> ve-he-cha-Lutz And the armed הֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech, men went לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> lif-Nei before הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests; תָּקְעוּ ta-ke-'u כתֹּקְעֵ֖י <WH8628> to-ke-'Ei blew קהַשּֽׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> hash-sho-fa-Rot; with the trumpets וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <WH622> ve-ham-'as-Sef, and the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> ho-leCh came אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הָאָר֔וֹן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron, the ark הָל֖וֹךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch [the priests] going on וְתָק֥וֹעַ <WH8628> ve-ta-Ko-a' and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <WH7782> bash-sho-fa-Rot. with the trumpets

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעָם֩ <WH5971> ha-'Am the people צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo nor תָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH7321> ta-Ri-'u Ye shall not shout וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor תַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <WH8085> tash-Mi-'u nor make any noise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קוֹלְכֶ֔ם <WH6963> kol-Chem, with your voice וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> ye-Tze proceed מִפִּיכֶ֖ם <WH6310> mip-pi-Chem out of your mouth דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> da-Var; neither shall [any] word עַ֠ד <WH5704> 'ad until י֣וֹם <WH3117> Yom until the day אָמְרִ֧י <WH559> 'a-me-Ri I bid אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem about הָרִ֖יעוּ <WH7321> ha-Ri-'u you shout וַהֲרִיעֹתֶֽם׃ <WH7321> va-ha-ri-'o-Tem. then shall ye shout

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <WH5437> vai-yas-Sev compassed אֲרוֹן־ <WH727> 'a-ron- So the ark יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, the city הַקֵּ֖ף <WH5362> hak-Kef going about פַּ֣עַם <WH6471> Pa-'am anvil אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> 'e-Chat; they וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they came הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh, into the camp וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <WH3885> vai-ya-Li-nu and lodged בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Bam-ma-cha-Neh. in the camp פ Peh

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> vai-yash-Kem rose early יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker; in the morning וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U took up הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim and the priests אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah And seven הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim priests נֹשְׂאִים֩ <WH5375> no-se-'Im bearing שִׁבְעָ֨ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah seven שׁוֹפְר֜וֹת <WH7782> shof-Rot trumpets הַיֹּבְלִ֗ים <WH3104> hai-yoe-Lim, of rams' horns לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD הֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> ho-le-Chim went on הָל֔וֹךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch, continually וְתָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> ve-ta-ke-'U and blew בַּשּׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> bash-sho-fa-Rot; with the trumpets וְהֶחָלוּץ֙ <WH2502> ve-he-cha-Lutz and the armed men הֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech went לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem, before וְהַֽמְאַסֵּ֗ף <WH622> ve-ham-'as-Sef, them but the rereward הֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> ho-leCh came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD; הֹולֵךְ ho-lech כהָלֹ֖וךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch came קוְתָק֥וֹעַ <WH8628> ve-ta-Ko-a' and blowing בַּשּׁוֹפָרֽוֹת׃ <WH7782> bash-sho-fa-Rot. with the trumpets

וַיָּסֹ֨בּוּ <WH5437> vai-ya-Sob-bu they compassed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֜יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> hash-she-Ni And the second פַּ֣עַם <WH6471> Pa-'am anvil אַחַ֔ת <WH259> 'a-Chat, a וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu and returned הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh; into the camp כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh so עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su so they did שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> She-shet six יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. days

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> vay-Hi become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, And it came to pass on the seventh וַיַּשְׁכִּ֙מוּ֙ <WH7925> vai-yash-Ki-mu that they rose early כַּעֲל֣וֹת <WH7837> ka-'a-Lot of the day הַשַּׁ֔חַר <WH7837> hash-Sha-char, of the day וַיָּסֹ֧בּוּ <WH5437> vai-ya-Sob-bu and compassed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֛יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> kam-mish-Pat after the same manner הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh the same שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim; times רַ֚ק <WH7535> rak that בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom only on that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he סָבְב֥וּ <WH5437> sa-ve-Vu they compassed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven פְּעָמִֽים׃ <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim. times

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> bap-Pa-'am time הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ית <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'It, And it came to pass at the seventh תָּקְע֥וּ <WH8628> ta-ke-'U blew הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim when the priests בַּשּׁוֹפָר֑וֹת <WH7782> bash-sho-fa-Rot; with the trumpets וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am unto the people הָרִ֔יעוּ <WH7321> ha-Ri-'u, Shout כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> na-Tan hath given יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. you the city
